Family Planning

Family planning helps individuals and couples make informed decisions about pregnancy and reproductive health. It empowers families to choose when to have children and promotes healthy spacing between pregnancies.

Family Planning Services

  • Counseling and education on reproductive health
  • Provision of contraceptive methods
  • Natural family planning techniques
  • Preconception health screening
  • Postpartum family planning options
Goal: To support families in achieving their desired family size and improving maternal and child health through safe and effective planning.

Available Contraceptive Methods

- Oral contraceptive pills
- Injectable contraceptives
- Intrauterine Device (IUD)
- Implants
- Condoms
- Natural methods (calendar, basal body temperature)

Benefits of Family Planning

Family planning helps reduce maternal and infant mortality, promotes better child care, and allows parents to focus on financial and emotional readiness before each pregnancy.
